General.Name: Caitong Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: Caitong Securities Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides securities brokerage services in China and internationally. The company is involved in the securities investment consulting, self-operation, underwriting and sponsorship, trading, and lending services; financial advisors related to securities trading and securities investment activities; agency sales of securities investment funds; and margin financing, listed securities market-making transaction, public offering securities investment fund management, financial product investment, equity investment, industrial investment, investment management and advice, investment consulting, asset management, financial consulting, advice on securities investment and institutional financing, information consulting, and other services. It also engages in the wealth management, investment bank, private equity fund, future and other fund, institutional, financial derivative, asset custody, and jucai investment advisory activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
